t: What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: Amazon brand gating helps your business prevent unauthorized resellers from using your brand name to sell knock-off versions of your products. Instead, resellers must provide proof that they’re an authorized reseller, like through an invoice and written permission from your brand.
